SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.storage

Class LocalStorageProcessor

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.storage.AbstractStorageProcessor
com.mimecast.robin.storage.LocalStorageProcessor
All Implemented Interfaces:
StorageProcessor
public class LocalStorageProcessor extends AbstractStorageProcessor
Local storage processor for mailbox storage.

Copies emails from tmp storage to recipient-specific mailbox folders.
